content: this legal text provides an overview of a case referred to as case n° 2362023 without disclosing the names of the parties involved the court ruled in favor of the first wife who will receive a payment of 14209 euros the case lasted for almost 8 years from march 20 2015 to january 23 2023 the court made a decision regarding the division of assets specifically a property located in c and assigned the entire property to the person bringing the case the exwife was ordered to make a payment of 57'023,63 to the person bringing the case and their children the text explains the regulations regarding the division of interest coheirs portions in a legal case the court is dividing the estate of a deceased person who had a first wife and children from both the first and second marriages the court referred to article 1116 of the italian civil code and the case is being heard by the court of appeal in naples the court has issued a judgment regarding the division of the hereditary property including a marital home and other assets the judgment has been appealed and the court has made adjustments to the initial judgment the case is still ongoing and the court has reserved its decision on certain matters the naples court of appeals has made a final decision in a case involving parental authority over a minor child ordering one party to pay a sum of 5702363 euros to the other party the court also determined the costs of the courtappointed expert should be split between the parties
